knowledge_panel.description: sonic the hedgehog 2 is an upcoming superhero comedy film based on the video game franchise published by sega. it is the sequel to sonic the hedgehog and is once again directed by jeff fowler and written by pat casey, josh miller and john whittington. wikipedia
